item.title: Sorry!
item.description: Hey guys, I’m back and sorry for the inconvenience but I will be posting weekly now cause there is too much to write in one day so yeah. Now, Chapter one of Ghosts will be postponed until next Monday! C’ya! Sorry bout this! -Sneha 8/4/2020
